001
002package com.commercetools.api.models.product;
003
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.Optional;
006import java.util.stream.Collectors;
007
008public interface ProductProjectionMixin extends ProductDataLike {
009    public String getId();
010
011    default Optional<ProductVariant> findVariant(final ByIdVariantIdentifier identifier) {
012        return getId().equals(identifier.getProductId()) ? Optional.ofNullable(getVariant(identifier.getVariantId()))
013                : Optional.empty();
014    }
015
016    /**
017     * Finds all variants that match the search criteria used in the search request, if any.
018     * @return the list containing all matching variants
019     */
020    default List<ProductVariant> findMatchingVariants() {
021        return getAllVariants().stream()
022                .filter(v -> Optional.ofNullable(v.getIsMatchingVariant()).orElse(false))
023                .collect(Collectors.toList());
024    }
025
026    /**
027     * Finds the first matching variant according to the search criteria used in the search request, if any.
028     * @return the first product variant that matches the search criteria, or empty if none does
029     */
030    default Optional<ProductVariant> findFirstMatchingVariant() {
031        return findMatchingVariants().stream().findFirst();
032    }
033}
